pageContext.claim: “Some of the best farmland in the world, by the way, can't be used because they don't have water. But they actually have a lot of water.”
pageContext.analysis: California has water problems no doubt, but the decline in farmland has to do with urbanization not ongoing water disputes. Plus, the draughts have ended. This executive order will likely take away from environmental conservation, as experts say Trump misses the nuance of water policy debates.
